description.value: You come from a line of wandering mercenaries, constantly on the march and scavenging food on the trail. If you fail, but not critically fail, to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Subsist]{Subsist} in the wilderness, you can still keep yourself fed with poor meals. When exploring, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Hustle]{Hustle} twice as long before you have to stop.
